text.$invariant:
Choosing the right commercial door motor is crucial for your businesses needs and budget. At Automatic Technology, we can help you find the perfect door to fit your requirements. Automating your commercial or industrial door can make entering and exiting your business more convenient, while also enhancing the security of your property and ensuring the safety of your employees.

What sets Automatic Technology commercial door operators apart?

contentData.description: Automatic Technology commercial door operators ensure the safety of your employees and premises.
contentData.heading: Superior protection

contentData.description: Built-in automatic reversing smarts detect obstructions and automatically reverse the door to prevent accidents.
contentData.heading: In-built logics

contentData.description: Automatic back drive forces the door back down if it senses an intruder is trying to lift the door, providing an extra layer of security for your business.
contentData.heading: Prevent unwanted entry

contentData.description: Easy and reliable installation ensures that your commercial or industrial door can be operated smoothly day in and day out for many years to come.
contentData.heading: Easy to install

contentData.description: Soft start and stop technology reduce stress on the operator, allowing the door to open and close quickly and quietly year after year.
contentData.heading: Smooth operation

contentData.description: Safety reminders in the form of audio and visual cues let you know when the operator is ready for servicing.
contentData.heading: Smart alerts

contentData.description: Our operators are stress-tested for durability, ensuring their longevity and reliability in any commercial or industrial setting.
contentData.heading: Strong and dependable

contentData.description: Choose Automatic Technology door motors to ensure the safety and security of your business, while enjoying the convenience and reliability of automatic door operation
contentData.heading: Convenient and Reliable
